Things

Class Operation

  • java.lang.Object
    • NLP.Synonyms
      • Things.Operation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Operation
extends Synonyms
implements java.io.Serializable
    An operation that can be performed in a determined Domain, that has optional and mandatory parameters.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • fromJson

        public static Operation fromJson(java.lang.String json)
        Build a Operation from a JSON, if the JSON is not properly formatted the given object will have id=NoOperations? and words={NoWords?}
        Parameters:
        json - String JSON formatted representing the Parameter
        Returns:
        Instance of Operation built with data from the JSON

      • getFirstSentence

        public java.lang.String getFirstSentence()
        Get a sentence that can invoke this operation
        Returns:
        The first sentence contained in textInvocation set. If there are no sentences it will return "No default sentence inserted";
